name: Birdie Grub (GBJAM 9)
description:
Want to chill in the sky? In this easygoing game, you'll play a little bird wandering in the sky, gliding on the lookout for some fresh sweets.

No stress and all chill! You choose the game duration and there's no way for your little birdie to be harmed :-)

The less you touch the inputs and let your character glide in the wind, the more you'll be rewarded when you catch a treat. It's up to you to find the right balance between flapping, diving, or just lingering. (To clarify, bonus score is computed based on the time elapsed since your last input).

EDIT: Thanks to the extra 24 hours, I managed to update the assets and even add some music! Yay!
